name: Mausoleum Mage

skills.name: Soul Manacles
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-target ATK-scaling damage. Damage Multiplier: 4.6 ATK (high for Support role). Books increase damage +15% total.
30% chance to place 30% Decrease SPD debuff for 2 turns (50% when booked). Useful for speed control in Fire Knight, Arena.

skills.book_value: Low priority. +15% damage, +20% debuff chance (30% → 50%). A2 and A3 are higher priority for books.
skills.notes: Filler skill. Decent damage multiplier (4.6 ATK) for Support. Decrease SPD useful for Fire Knight (turn meter control) and Arena. Requires ACC to land. Low priority for books.

skills.name: Might of Undeath
skills.description: Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 1 turn. Also places a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Block Debuffs buff for 1 turn. Prevents all debuffs from being applied. CRITICAL for Clan Boss stun blocking, Dragon poison/stun, Ice Golem freeze.
30% Increase C.RATE buff for 2 turns. Damage amplification for team. Synergizes with Seer (3 buffs to strip for nuke).
60% Increase DEF buff for 2 turns. Major survivability boost. Synergizes with Seer (buff strip nuke).

skills.book_value: HIGHEST PRIORITY. Cooldown reduction from 4 → 3 turns is MANDATORY. Enables reliable Clan Boss stun blocking (3-turn rotation) and consistent buff uptime.
skills.notes: CORE SKILL. Block Debuffs is game-changing for Clan Boss (stun blocking), Dragon (poison/stun), Ice Golem (freeze). 3 buffs synergize perfectly with Seer for massive AOE nuke. AI prioritizes A2 over A3 when both available. Cooldown books MANDATORY.

skills.name: Winds of Purging
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then heals all allies by 10% of this Champion's MAX HP. Heals each ally by a further 10% if 1 or more debuffs are removed from that ally. Fills each ally's Turn Meter by 15% if 2 or more debuffs are removed from that ally.

effects.notes: Removes ALL debuffs from all allies. Full cleanse. Executed BEFORE heal, so heal benefits from debuff removal bonus.
Base heal: 10% of Mausoleum Mage MAX HP per ally (13% with 3 books: 10% x 1.1 x 1.1 x 1.1 = ~13.3%). Scales with MM's HP, not ally HP.
Conditional bonus heal: +10% of MM MAX HP if 1+ debuffs removed from ally. Total heal with removal: 20% base + 30% booked = 26.6% of MM MAX HP.
Conditional TM boost: 15% if 2+ debuffs removed from ally. Speed tuning aid. NOTE: TM boost can disrupt Clan Boss speed tunes (avoid Rapid Response mastery).

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY. Heal +30% total (10% → 13.3% multiplicative), cooldown reduction 5 → 4 turns. Both heal and cooldown improvements are critical.
skills.notes: Powerful cleanse + heal combo. Heal scales with MM's MAX HP (build HP% on MM for bigger team heals). Conditional mechanics: 1+ debuff = +10% heal, 2+ debuffs = +15% TM. WARNING: TM boost can break Clan Boss speed tunes if allies have 2+ debuffs. Avoid Rapid Response mastery for CB. AI triggers A3 when debuffs present.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: GOOD AI. AI prioritizes A2 (Might of Undeath) over A3 (Winds of Purging) when both available, which is correct behavior for most content. A2 provides Block Debuffs + Inc C.RATE + Inc DEF (3 buffs). A3 triggers when team has debuffs to cleanse. No manual intervention needed for CB/Dungeons.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: A2 provides 3 buffs (Block Debuffs, Inc C.RATE, Inc DEF) which is PERFECT for Seer's Karma Burn nuke (strips ally buffs for massive damage). Mausoleum Mage + Seer = meta cheese strategy for speed farming dungeons, Doom Tower waves, Faction Wars. Combine with other buff providers (Renegade, Kymar, Arbiter) for maximum Seer damage. MM's Block Debuffs protects team from boss debuffs, cleanse A3 removes any that land, then Seer nukes with MM's 3 buffs.

mechanics_advisory: Mausoleum Mage is an exceptional Support champion rated far higher by community than official ratings show. Primary use cases: (1) Clan Boss stun blocker: A2 Block Debuffs on 3-turn rotation (when booked) prevents AOE stun, enabling unkillable/budget teams. (2) Seer synergy: A2 provides 3 buffs for massive Karma Burn damage. (3) Cleanser: A3 full cleanse + conditional heal scales with MM's MAX HP (build HP% on MM for bigger team heals). (4) Speed Control: A1 Decrease SPD for Fire Knight turn meter control. WARNING: A3 TM boost (15% if 2+ debuffs removed) can disrupt Clan Boss speed tunes - avoid Rapid Response mastery. Books MANDATORY: A2 cooldown 4→3 for CB stun rotation, A3 heal +30% + cooldown 5→4. Best paired with: Seer (cheese nuke), Renegade (cooldown reset), high-HP champions (A3 heal scales with MM HP). Community consensus: 'Top 5 cleanser', 'Exceptionally fast', 'Carry to endgame'. HellHades: 5/5 Arena, 5/5 Hydra, 4/5 dungeons.
